org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.document.options.navigation

Interface DocumentStorePropertyContext<E extends DocumentStoreEntityContext<E,P>,P extends DocumentStorePropertyContext<E,P>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PropertyContext<E,P>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CouchDBPropertyContext, MongoDBPropertyContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseDocumentStorePropertyContext, CouchDBPropertyContextImpl, MongoDBPropertyContextImpl

    public interface DocumentStorePropertyContext<E extends DocumentStoreEntityContext<E,P>,P extends DocumentStorePropertyContext<E,P>>
extends PropertyContext<E,P>
    Allows to configure document store options applying on a per-association level.
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      P associationStorage(AssociationStorageType storage)
      Specifies how associations of the configured property should be persisted.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.hibernate.ogm.options.navigation.PropertyContext

        entity, property

    • Method Detail

      • associationStorage

        P associationStorage(AssociationStorageType storage)
        Specifies how associations of the configured property should be persisted. Only applies if the property represents an association.
        Parameters:
        storage - the association storage type to be used; overrides any settings on the entity or global level
        Returns:
        this context, allowing for further fluent API invocations
